categories_banner_view.answer_2: This is the second item's accordion body. It is hidden by default, until the collapse plugin adds the appropriate classes that we use to style each element. become_consultant.sub_heading: Here are the simple 4 steps to register yourself as a mentor.

step2.sub_heading: Write your education and experience credentials

step4.sub_heading: Set your schedule of availability, mode of consultancy (Audio, video and chat) and your charges.

all_categories.sub_heading: We are providing a wide range of categories to consult your Consultant; we have tried hard to sum up all the categories where you can discuss your issues with the experts of their fields. They will guide you in the best way.

section1.title: About Us
section1.paragraph_text1: Mashvra is a human care, consulting platform and a solution hub that allows mentee to book the experts of every field of life regarding medical, spiritual, religious, corporate, financial, Phycological, social, educationists, career, legal, cultural, travel and any other experts/ consultants/specialists/consultants around the world in seconds while providing information related to the consultancy requirement, using reliable and secure virtual connectivity 24/7 with the professionals for solution provision. Easy and user-friendly payment methods are used.

section2.title: Why Choose Us
section2.paragraph_text1: Mashvra is a platform for the Mentees (who need the consultancy) to meet their consultants (consultants) and discuss about their complication and issues.  We are covering almost all the factors of the life like; medical, education, food, business, cultural, physiological issues, civil, engineers, life style, fashion, career, and many more. Mentee can check the profile of the Consultant, book the appointment and can discuss the regarding problem. All three mode of communication (Chat, Audio and Video call) are available on Mashvra. Easy payment methods are available to avoid the hassle.

section3.title: Our Mission
section3.paragraph_text1: Our mission is to provide the facility for those people who haven’t time or due to other issues they can’t go or visit to the corresponding person. Mashvra is providing facility of consultancy just on a single click. Today is the age of digitalization and most people are diligent in a daily cycle. They are facing issues as well, so they need to consult them with the specialized person. Mashvra is providing them that platform where they can find every solution regarding their problems

generate_scheduling.sub_heading: You can generate your own slots according to your availability. These Slots may consist of ‘time in a day’ or ‘day in a week’ mode of communication (Chat, Audio, video and physical), and fee structure.

chat.sub_heading: You can set your consultancy fee for chat mode.
chat.label: Select Fee Charges for Chat

video.sub_heading: You can create schedule whether, for how many days you will be available in a week or in a month. You can set your fee charges, and available for video consultancy time in a day.

video.fill_schedule_heading: Fill your Field for complete your video schedule and generate slots

audio.heading: Audio Consultation Schedule
